last_episode_to_air.name: Divorce
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ruth returns home believing divorce is the only option.

name: On the Up
overview: On the Up is a British sitcom written by Bob Larbey about a self-made millionaire and his staff of domestic helpers who he treats like family, much to the annoyance of his upper class wife. The show ran for three series, from 1990 to 1992.

episodes.name: Walking Out
episodes.overview: Tony turns to his chauffeur, secretary and housekeeper for support when his wife walks out.

episodes.name: Mum
episodes.overview: Tony's mother is hospitalized with appendicitis; Ruth returns home.

episodes.name: Mr Burton
episodes.overview: Tony takes a marquee at the County Show to promote his business.

episodes.name: Dawn
episodes.overview: Ruth returns and accuses Tony of sleeping with Dawn; Tony takes Sam, Maggie and Mrs. Wembley to Stephanie's Open Day at school.

episodes.name: Maggie's Dad
episodes.overview: Tony throws a birthday party for his mother; Maggie's father visits

episodes.name: Douglas
episodes.overview: Mrs. Wembley gives her good friend Sir Douglas another cooking lesson; Tony and Maggie spend time alone.

episodes.name: Barbados
episodes.overview: Tony asks Sam to accompany him to Barbados when Ruth goes to Spain with another man.

episodes.name: After the Holiday
episodes.overview: Tony and the gang return from Barbados to find a little surprise awaiting them.

episodes.name: Ruth Makes An Effort
episodes.overview: Ruth and Tony reconcile; Tony's secretary, Maggie, has trouble being civil to Ruth.

episodes.name: Maggie Gives Notice
episodes.overview: Tony's happy to have his whole family home together; Maggie gives her notice.

episodes.name: Competition
episodes.overview: Tony finds out another firm is undercutting his prices and decides to plant a mole in the opposition's camp.

episodes.name: Meeting Jane Webster
episodes.overview: Tony's marriage hits another rough patch; Mrs. Wembley sets up a date for Sam and Maggie.

episodes.name: A Date With Jane Webster
episodes.overview: Tony makes another date with Jane Webster, against Sam's advice; Maggie and Sam go to a football game.

episodes.name: The Golf Tournament
episodes.overview: The Carpenter household cannot get straight whether they will have a fancy dress party.

episodes.name: The Fishing Trip
episodes.overview: Tony and Dawn go fishing, which does not please Ruth.

episodes.name: Temporary Secretary
episodes.overview: Dawn arrives for her new job; three of Tony's drivers go home sick; Tony picks up Jane.

episodes.name: Parental Choice
episodes.overview: Tony, Mrs. Wembley and Sam act out 'Sunset Boulevard'; Mrs. Wembley auditions gardeners.

episodes.name: Stephanie
episodes.overview: Tony's new woman is a hit with everyone except Ruth.

episodes.name: Divorce
episodes.overview: Ruth returns home believing divorce is the only option.
